name: A Trash Game
description:
A Trash Game is a generic platformer where its "unique" feature is its wall jumping mechanic.  

Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys to move. Space to jump.

Pressing the space key on a wall mid air will make you "ledge kick/wall jump" forward.

Holding  W or the Up arrow while wall jumping will make you go higher. Holding S or the down arrow will send you down.
